## R code

```{r, eval = F}
my_cars <- readRDS(here::here("data/my_cars.rds"))

ggplot(data = my_cars, aes(x = disp, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  geom_smooth() +
  labs(x = "Displacement (probably in cc)",
       y = "Fuel economy (miles per galon: mpg)")
```

## Test of a map

```{r}
wrld <- rnaturalearth::ne_countries()
ggplot(wrld, aes(fill = continent)) +
  geom_sf()
```
